content: Hi there - does anyone know what the situation is with the public FHIR server at spark.furore.com? I've been seeing a '503 Service Unavailable' since last week. Sent an email to them yesterday but no response yet and just wanted to check if anybody else is also having issues?
I assume they have had some issues getting Vonk up and running (The STU3 server)

Vonk is coming up very soon...
Spark shouldn't be down though, we'll check that.
